title: Project A
desc_zh: 关于环境与可持续的单元
detail_en: This project helps students explore sustainability topics through Mandarin.
detail_zh: 该项目帮助学生通过中文学习探讨可持续性主题。

title: Project B
detail_en: Students analyze cultural elements and reflect on their identity.
detail_zh: 学生分析文化元素并反思自我认同。

title: Project C
detail_en: Combining programming with language learning for creative expression.
detail_zh: 结合编程与语言学习，促进学生创意表达。
